price: Maka apakah patut Tuhan memilihkan bagimu anak-anak laki-laki sedang Dia sendiri mengambil anak-anak perempuan di antara para malaikat? Sesungguhnya kamu benar-benar mengucapkan kata-kata yang besar (dosanya).
arabic: أَفَأَصۡفَىٰكُمۡ رَبُّكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ وَٱتَّخَذَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنَٰثًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَقُولُونَ قَوۡلًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afa-aṣfākum rabbukum bil-banīna wa-ittakhadha mina al-malāikati ināthan innakum lataqūlūna qawlan ʿaẓīman
translations: Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
